title: Power class of union and intersection

blocks.name: pwin
blocks.content: The power class of the intersection of two classes is the intersection of their power classes. Exercise 4.12(j) of [Mendelson] p. 235. (Contributed by NM, 23-Nov-2003.)
blocks.origin:
thm pwin(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(cpw(cin(c0, c1)), cin(cpw(c0), cpw(c1)))
} = {
  eqcomi(cpw(cin(c0, c1)), cin(cpw(c0), cpw(c1)))
  ineqri(hs0, cpw(c0), cpw(c1), cpw(cin(c0, c1)))
  3bitr4i(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cin(c0, c1))), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cv(hs0), c1)), wss(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c1)))
  ssin(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  anbi12i(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c1)), wss(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cv(hs0), c1))
  selpw(hs0, c0)
  selpw(hs0, c1)
  selpw(hs0, cin(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(cin(c0, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cin(c0, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm pwin(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ P((c0 ⋂ c1))=(P(c0)⋂ P(c1))
} = {
  eqcomi(P((c0 ⋂ c1)), (P(c0)⋂ P(c1)))
  ineqri(hs0, P(c0), P(c1), P((c0 ⋂ c1)))
  3bitr4i((hs0 ∈ P(c0)∧ hs0 ∈ P(c1)), hs0 ∈ P((c0 ⋂ c1)), (hs0 ⊆ c0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c1), hs0 ⊆(c0 ⋂ c1))
  ssin(hs0, c0, c1)
  anbi12i(hs0 ∈ P(c0), hs0 ∈ P(c1), hs0 ⊆ c0, hs0 ⊆ c1)
  selpw(hs0, c0)
  selpw(hs0, c1)
  selpw(hs0, (c0 ⋂ c1))
  diff.hs0.c(P(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(P(c1))
  diff.hs0.c(P((c0 ⋂ c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 ⋂ c1))
}

blocks.name: pwunss
blocks.content: The power class of the union of two classes includes the union of their power classes. Exercise 4.12(k) of [Mendelson] p. 235. (Contributed by NM, 23-Nov-2003.)
blocks.origin:
thm pwunss(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wss(cun(cpw(c0), cpw(c1)), cpw(cun(c0, c1)))
} = {
  ssriv(hs0, cun(cpw(c0), cpw(c1)), cpw(cun(c0, c1)))
  3imtr4i(wcel(cv(hs0), cun(cpw(c0), cpw(c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cun(c0, c1))), wo(wss(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cv(hs0), c1)), wss(cv(hs0), cun(c0, c1)))
  ssun(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  bitri(wcel(cv(hs0), cun(cpw(c0), cpw(c1))), wo(wss(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cv(hs0), c1)), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c1))))
  elun(cv(hs0), cpw(c0), cpw(c1))
  orbi12i(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c1)), wss(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cv(hs0), c1))
  selpw(hs0, c0)
  selpw(hs0, c1)
  selpw(hs0, cun(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cun(cpw(c0), cpw(c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(cun(c0, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cun(c0, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm pwunss(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (P(c0)⋃ P(c1))⊆ P((c0 ⋃ c1))
} = {
  ssriv(hs0, (P(c0)⋃ P(c1)), P((c0 ⋃ c1)))
  3imtr4i(hs0 ∈(P(c0)⋃ P(c1)), hs0 ∈ P((c0 ⋃ c1)), (hs0 ⊆ c0 ∨ hs0 ⊆ c1), hs0 ⊆(c0 ⋃ c1))
  ssun(hs0, c0, c1)
  bitri(hs0 ∈(P(c0)⋃ P(c1)), (hs0 ⊆ c0 ∨ hs0 ⊆ c1), (hs0 ∈ P(c0)∨ hs0 ∈ P(c1)))
  elun(hs0, P(c0), P(c1))
  orbi12i(hs0 ∈ P(c0), hs0 ∈ P(c1), hs0 ⊆ c0, hs0 ⊆ c1)
  selpw(hs0, c0)
  selpw(hs0, c1)
  selpw(hs0, (c0 ⋃ c1))
  diff.hs0.c((P(c0)⋃ P(c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(P((c0 ⋃ c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 ⋃ c1))
}

blocks.name: pwssun
blocks.content: The power class of the union of two classes is a subset of the union of their power classes, iff one class is a subclass of the other. Exercise 4.12(l) of [Mendelson] p. 235. (Contributed by NM, 23-Nov-2003.)
blocks.origin:
thm pwssun(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wo(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, c0)), wss(cpw(cun(c0, c1)), cun(cpw(c0), cpw(c1))))
} = {
  impbii(wo(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, c0)), wss(cpw(cun(c0, c1)), cun(cpw(c0), cpw(c1))))
  syl(wo(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, c0)), wss(cpw(cun(c0, c1)), cun(cpw(c0), cpw(c1))), wo(wss(cpw(cun(c0, c1)), cpw(c0)), wss(cpw(cun(c0, c1)), cpw(c1))))
  orcoms(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, c0), wo(wss(cpw(cun(c0, c1)), cpw(c0)), wss(cpw(cun(c0, c1)), cpw(c1))))
  orim12i(wss(c1, c0), wss(c0, c1), wss(cpw(cun(c0, c1)), cpw(c0)), wss(cpw(cun(c0, c1)), cpw(c1)))
  sylbi(wss(c1, c0), wss(cpw(cun(c0, c1)), cpw(c0)), wceq(cun(c0, c1), c0))
  ssequn2(c1, c0)
  syl(wceq(cun(c0, c1), c0), wss(cpw(cun(c0, c1)), cpw(c0)), wceq(cpw(cun(c0, c1)), cpw(c0)))
  pweq(cun(c0, c1), c0)
  eqimss(cpw(cun(c0, c1)), cpw(c0))
  sylbi(wss(c0, c1), wss(cpw(cun(c0, c1)), cpw(c1)), wceq(cun(c0, c1), c1))
  ssequn1(c0, c1)
  syl(wceq(cun(c0, c1), c1), wss(cpw(cun(c0, c1)), cpw(c1)), wceq(cpw(cun(c0, c1)), cpw(c1)))
  pweq(cun(c0, c1), c1)
  eqimss(cpw(cun(c0, c1)), cpw(c1))
  ssun(cpw(cun(c0, c1)), cpw(c0), cpw(c1))
  orrd(wss(cpw(cun(c0, c1)), cun(cpw(c0), cpw(c1))), wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, c0))
  ex(wss(cpw(cun(c0, c1)), cun(cpw(c0), cpw(c1))), wn(wss(c0, c1)), wss(c1, c0))
  ssrdv(hs0, c1, c0, wa(wss(cpw(cun(c0, c1)), cun(cpw(c0), cpw(c1))), wn(wss(c0, c1))))
  imp(wss(cpw(cun(c0, c1)), cun(cpw(c0), cpw(c1))), wn(wss(c0, c1)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  com23(wss(cpw(cun(c0, c1)), cun(cpw(c0), cpw(c1))), wn(wss(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6ib(wss(cpw(cun(c0, c1)), cun(cpw(c0), cpw(c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wi(wn(wss(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wi(wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wss(c0, c1)))
  exp31(wss(cpw(cun(c0, c1)), cun(cpw(c0), cpw(c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wss(c0, c1))
  ssrdv(hs1, c0, c1, wa(wa(wss(cpw(cun(c0, c1)), cun(cpw(c0), cpw(c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0))))
  impancom(wa(wss(cpw(cun(c0, c1)), cun(cpw(c0), cpw(c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))
  ord(wa(wa(wss(cpw(cun(c0, c1)), cun(cpw(c0), cpw(c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))
  syl(wa(wa(wss(cpw(cun(c0, c1)), cun(cpw(c0), cpw(c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wo(wcel(cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cpw(c0)), wcel(cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cpw(c1))))
  sylib(wa(wa(wss(cpw(cun(c0, c1)), cun(cpw(c0), cpw(c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wo(wcel(cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cpw(c0)), wcel(cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cpw(c1))), wcel(cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cun(cpw(c0), cpw(c1))))
  imp31(wss(cpw(cun(c0, c1)), cun(cpw(c0), cpw(c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cun(cpw(c0), cpw(c1))))
  expcomd(wss(cpw(cun(c0, c1)), cun(cpw(c0), cpw(c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cun(cpw(c0), cpw(c1))))
  syl5(wss(cpw(cun(c0, c1)), cun(cpw(c0), cpw(c1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cun(cpw(c0), cpw(c1))), wcel(cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cpw(cun(c0, c1))))
  sylib(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cpw(cun(c0, c1))), wss(cun(csn(cv(hs1)), csn(cv(hs0))), cun(c0, c1)))
  syl2anb(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wss(cun(csn(cv(hs1)), csn(cv(hs0))), cun(c0, c1)), wss(csn(cv(hs1)), c0), wss(csn(cv(hs0)), c1))
  snss(cv(hs1), c0)
  snss(cv(hs0), c1)
  unss12(csn(cv(hs1)), c0, csn(cv(hs0)), c1)
  bitr2i(wss(cun(csn(cv(hs1)), csn(cv(hs0))), cun(c0, c1)), wcel(cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cpw(cun(c0, c1))), wss(cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cun(c0, c1)))
  elpw(cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cun(c0, c1))
  sseq1i(cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cun(c0, c1), cun(csn(cv(hs1)), csn(cv(hs0))))
  df-pr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))
  ssel(cpw(cun(c0, c1)), cun(cpw(c0), cpw(c1)), cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))
  elun(cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cpw(c0), cpw(c1))
  orim12i(wcel(cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cpw(c0)), wcel(cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cpw(c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))
  simprbi(wcel(cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cpw(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c0))
  bitr4i(wcel(cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cpw(c0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wss(cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c0))
  elpw(cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c0)
  prss(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0))
  simplbi(wcel(cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cpw(c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  bitr4i(wcel(cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cpw(c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wss(cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c1))
  elpw(cpr(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c1)
  zfpair2(hs1, hs0)
  prss(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs0))
  vex(hs1)
  vex(hs0)
  con1b(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wss(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wss(cpw(cun(c0, c1)), cun(cpw(c0), cpw(c1))), wn(wss(c0, c1))))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wa(wss(cpw(cun(c0, c1)), cun(cpw(c0), cpw(c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0))))
}

blocks.name: pwundif
blocks.content: Break up the power class of a union into a union of smaller classes. (Contributed by NM, 25-Mar-2007.) (Proof shortened by Thierry Arnoux, 20-Dec-2016.)

blocks.name: pwun
blocks.content: The power class of the union of two classes equals the union of their power classes, iff one class is a subclass of the other. Part of Exercise 7(b) of [Enderton] p. 28. (Contributed by NM, 23-Nov-2003.)
